channel.title: Blow Kiss Emote's Animation ID
channel.description:
So I just implemented an animation attribute block into my player updating. My server framework is built to handle revision 317 clients.
I started by adding the emote animation buttons within one of the sidebar interfaces. I have managed to find the animation IDs for most of the emotes with the exception of the Blow Kiss emote.
So could anyone help me out with it the ID?

item.title: Blow Kiss Emote's Animation ID
